title: Lone Star Obsession
description: When a doctor is found murdered, investigators are stumped as to who would want him dead. Police discover simmering jealousies and a love triangle. Andrea Canning has the latest developments. Originally aired on NBC on October 8, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
